SELECT manager_id, manager_pw, manager_name, manager_phoneNo, manager_email, manager_profile_original, manager_profile_changed, manager_addr, manager_detail_addr, manager_dept
FROM managers

SELECT manager_id, manager_pw, manager_name, manager_phoneNo, manager_email, manager_profile_original, manager_profile_changed, manager_addr, manager_detail_addr, manager_dept FROM managers WHERE manager_id = #{manager_id}
